name: The Colony (itch) (Maître Pantoufle)
description:
The Colony

*** Watch your ant colony grow ***

L I F T

D I G

F I G H T

P L A Y

- WARNING -
There's no real gameplay, it's more of a simulation than a game.
Just watch the ants move around and relax.

- CONTROLS -
Click on buttons below to spawn ants (workers, fighters, scouts).
Press R to Reset.
Press F to toggle fog of war.
Press E to spawn more fire ants (if the game is too easy for you).
Press Esc to quit the game.
